EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 1 - AirScale Radio Access E-book
EmailTemplate.subject: Ten reasons to start adopting the next generation radio network today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Meet new customer demands the instant they arise AirScale Radio Access <[[https://pages.nokia.com/1753.Airscale-Ebook.html]]> Build more agile, more scalable radio networks The next generation network delivers unlimited capacity and connectivity for any 5G and IoT need. Discover ten ways AirScale Radio Access can help you prepare for the future. Read the ebook <[[https://pages.nokia.com/1753.Airscale-Ebook.html]]> ► AirScale Radio Access is built according to three guiding principles:
- Open for innovation: cloud-based and open, AirScale is ready to support a world of new applications and services - Instant service deployment: create and deliver new services to your customers within days or even hours, not months - Flexible scalability: deploy unlimited scalability and unrestricted connectivity wherever it is needed, without lengthy preparation. © 2016 Nokia.
